DOC.brief_summary: This study randomize control trial aim evaluate effect homebased inspiratory muscle training ( IMT ) patient COPD Norway . The intervention group train threshold IMT 6 week . The control group participate training method sham . Evaluation parameter maximal inspiratory pressure , six minute walk test , COPD assessment test , modify Medical research council dyspnea scale spirometry .
DOC.brief_title: Inspiratory Muscle Training Patients With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disorder
DOC.criteria: COPD grade IIIIV , Inhabitant Hedmark ( Løten , Våler , Åsnes , Hamar , Elverum ) Undergoing exercise base physical therapy treatment , able IMT physically mentally
